name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】DISASTERSHOW ｜｜ Disasterpiece Release Mini Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #disastershow #calliolive [fuQ7VpAVFr4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Mori Calliope thanks the audience, discusses future streams, and promotes her new release.
End credits roll featuring the tracklist and staff, set to 'Opening Music' by PABLO.
A handwritten closing message from Mori Calliope to her fans (Dead Beats).
Cinematic teaser for 'DISASTERPIECE' featuring snippets of 'Orpheus'.

subtitles.original: ...singing them soon for you, on my streams.
subtitles.english: ...singing them soon for you, on my streams.

subtitles.original: So tune into my streams...
subtitles.english: So tune into my streams...

subtitles.original: ...and my- my karaoke streams...
subtitles.english: ...and my- my karaoke streams...

subtitles.original: ...and streams where I'm singing my stuff...
subtitles.english: ...and streams where I'm singing my stuff...

subtitles.original: ...and, uh, future shows.
subtitles.english: ...and, uh, future shows.

subtitles.original: If there's a song that you really want to hear,
subtitles.english: If there's a song that you really want to hear,

subtitles.original:
like I know a lot of you probably want to hear
"SHŪTEN", for example.
subtitles.english:

subtitles.original: So if you want to hear it,
subtitles.english: So if you want to hear it,

subtitles.original: you've got to stay tuned and come to the next one.
subtitles.english: you've got to stay tuned and come to the next one.

subtitles.original: Like I said, life has no encore.
subtitles.english: Like I said, life has no encore.

subtitles.original: So, what I want you to do now is...
subtitles.english: So, what I want you to do now is...

subtitles.original: ...just rewatch the live.
subtitles.english: ...just rewatch the live.

subtitles.original: And then go listen to the music.
subtitles.english: And then go listen to the music.

subtitles.original: Links in the description.
subtitles.english: Links in the description.

subtitles.original: Thank you Dead Beats always for cheering for me.
subtitles.english: Thank you Dead Beats always for cheering for me.

subtitles.original: Thank you for supporting what I do.
subtitles.english: Thank you for supporting what I do.

subtitles.original: I'm strange,
subtitles.english: I'm strange,

subtitles.original: but you know, this is really fun.
subtitles.english: but you know, this is really fun.

subtitles.original: I'm glad I get to do this every day.
subtitles.english: I'm glad I get to do this every day.

subtitles.original: And I put my whole heart into the new release.
subtitles.english: And I put my whole heart into the new release.

subtitles.original: So... I'll see you guys tomorrow.
subtitles.english: So... I'll see you guys tomorrow.

subtitles.original: We're playing a game.
subtitles.english: We're playing a game.

subtitles.original: There's- there's a game stream tomorrow.
subtitles.english: There's- there's a game stream tomorrow.

subtitles.original: See you guys around.
subtitles.english: See you guys around.

subtitles.original: Thanks again everyone!
subtitles.english: Thanks again everyone!

subtitles.original: I'm your Mori, hope you'll remember me.
subtitles.english: I'm your Mori, hope you'll remember me.

subtitles.original: Peace!
subtitles.english: Peace!
